  - Not so proud way of fixing lpar2rrd on 2.2.1 VIOS/IVMs.
    - Edit /etc/environment file and add these at the end of the PATH variable<code>/usr/ios/cli:/usr/ios/utils:/usr/ios/lpm/bin:/usr/ios/oem:/usr/ios/ldw/bin</code>
